data.eml:eml: Evolutionary relationships and taxonomy of Microtea (Microteaceae), a basal lineage in the core Caryophyllales

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sukhorukov, Alexander P., Sennikov, Alexander N., Nilova, Maya V., Mazei, Yuri, Kushunina, Maria, Marchioretto, Maria Salete, Hanacek, Pavel (2019): Evolutionary relationships and taxonomy of Microtea (Microteaceae), a basal lineage in the core Caryophyllales. PhytoKeys 115: 1-50, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.115.29041, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.115.29041
